name: Winston Churchill
what_did:
Churchill led Britain during World War II.
He gave powerful speeches that inspired people during hard times.
He helped plan the defeat of Nazi Germany and worked to bring peace afterward.
why_matters:
Churchill stood strong when his country needed him most.
He is remembered as a symbol of courage and leadership during war.
His words still inspire people today.

fun_fact: Churchill won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1953!
